sections.summary: experienced human resources professional with working knowledge of state and federal employment laws and regulations, dedicated to improving employee satisfaction, management-employee relations, and working conditions through commitment, communication, confidentiality, and a sense of urgency. looking for a company to share my skills and knowledge with where i can grow as a hr professional.
